description_en: Number of crimes in Malaysia by district, crime category, and type of crime.
description_ms: Bilangan jenayah di Malaysia mengikut daerah, kategori jenayah, dan jenis jenayah.
methodology_en:
This dataset is tabulated from transactional report-level data collected by the Police Reporting System administered by the Royal Malaysian Police. Most importantly, it shows the number of **actual crimes** (i.e. where a conviction has already occurred) rather than the number of **reported crimes**, which may include false reports. This dataset can also be used in analyses of sexual crime towards women, because all victims of rape as defined by the laws of Malaysia are female (i.e. there is no need to provide a separate dataset with disaggregation by sex).

For a deeper understanding of the methodology and associated concepts, please refer to the [Technical Notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/crime-technotes). Finally, it should be noted that Malaysia's national statistics on crime are compiled in accordance with the International Classification of Crime for Statistical Purpose Version 1.0, which was published by the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC), to ensure international comparability.
methodology_ms:
Set data ini dihasilkan daripada rekod transaksi peringkat laporan yang dikumpulkan oleh Sistem Pelaporan Polis yang dikendali oleh Polis Diraja Malaysia. Ia menunjukkan bilangan **jenayah sebenar** (iaitu di mana pesalah telah disabitkan) dan bukannya bilangan **jenayah dilaporkan**, yang termasuk laporan palsu. Selain itu, set data ini juga boleh digunakan dalam sebarang analisis jenayah seks terhaps wanita, kerana semua mangsa rogol seperti yang didefinisikan oleh undang-undang Malaysia adalah wanita (maka tiada keperluan untuk menerbitkan set data lain dengan pecahan mengikut jantina).

Untuk mendapat pemahaman yang lebih mendalam tentang metodologi dan konsep berkaitan, sila rujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/technical-notes/crime-technotes). Akhirnya, pihak kerajaan ingin maklumkan bahawa statistik jenayah Malaysia disusun selaras dengan Klasifikasi Jenayah untuk Tujuan Statistik (versi 1.0) yang diterbitkan oleh *United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)*, bagi memudahkan perbandingan dan penarafan antarabangsa.
caveat_en: Unreported crimes are not included in this dataset. In general, it is acknowledged that the true crime rate may exceed the reported crime rate, especially for crimes where there are significant disincentives or barriers to reporting.
caveat_ms: Jenayah yang tidak dilaporkan tidak termasuk dalam set data ini. Secara am, kadar jenayah sebenar mungkin melebihi kadar jenayah dilaporkan, terutamanya bagi jenayah di mana mangsa mengalami kesusahan tertentu dalam membuat laporan secara rasmi.

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 as the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan nilai MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: state
fields.description_en: [Categorical] One of 16 states, or Malaysia; however, data for W.P. Putrajaya and W.P. Labuan are subsumed under W.P. Kuala Lumpur and Sabah respectively.
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Satu dari 16 negeri, atau Malaysia; namun, data bagi W.P. Putrajaya dan W.P. Labuan disekalikan bersama W.P. Kuala Lumpur dan Sabah masing-masing.

fields.name: district
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Name of the police district; note that this is different from the administrative district.
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Nama daerah polis; perlu diingati bahawa ini berbeza daripada daerah pentadbiran

fields.name: category
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Either violent crime ('assault') or property crime ('property')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Jenayah kekerasan ('assault') atau jenayah harta benda ('property')

fields.name: type
fields.description_en: [Categorical] The specific type of crime in snake case
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Jenis khusus jenayah dalam format 'snake case'

fields.name: crimes
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of actual crimes where a conviction was secured
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan jenayah sebenar di mana pesalah telah disabitkan
